Package index

Fitting penalized linear mixed models (PLMMs - the featured presentation)

plmm()
Fit a linear mixed model with non-convex regularization

Loss, information, and cross-validation for PLMMs

cv_plmm()
Cross-validation for plmm
plmm_loss()
Loss method for "plmm" class
log_lik()
Evaluate the negative log-likelihood of an intercept-only Gaussian plmm model

Coefficient methods for PLMMs

coef(<cv_plmm>)
Coef method for "cv_plmm" class
coef(<plmm>)
Coef method for "plmm" class

Other model fitting methods (and some helper functions)

construct_variance()
a function to create the estimated variance matrix from a PLMM fit

Data (pre)processing and wrangling

get_data()
Read in processed data This function is intended to be called after either process_plink() or process_delim() has been called once.
find_example_data()
A function to help with accessing example PLINK files
get_bm_from_plink()
A function to convert the output of process_plink() into a big.matrix (such as could be passed to biglasso::biglasso())
process_plink()
Preprocess PLINK files using the bigsnpr package
process_delim()
A function to read in large data files as an FBM
relatedness_mat()
Calculate a relatedness matrix
unzip_example_data()
a companion function to unzip the .gz files that ship with the package Note: for Linux/Unix and MacOS only

Plotting, summarizing, and formatting

summary(<plmm>)
A summary method for the plmm objects
print(<summary.plmm>)
A function to print the summary of a plmm model
plot(<plmm>)
Plot method for plmm class
summary(<cv_plmm>)
A summary function for cv_plmm objects
print(<summary.cv_plmm>)
Print method for summary.cv_plmm objects
plot(<cv_plmm>)
Plot method for cv_plmm class

Prediction

predict(<plmm>)
Predict method for plmm class

Data sets

admix
Admix: Semi-simulated SNP data
pedigree
Pedigree: mock genotype data from a family-based design.

On this page
